title: Sovereign AGI Action Registry Definition (M-02)
description: Schema defining the structure of the internal Action Registry, listing all available Intents, their targets, and the required parameter schemas for unambiguous validation against M-01 Intents.

^[A-Z][a-zA-Z0-9]+$.description: Definitions for all actions available within a specific target component.

^[A-Z_]+$.description: Definition of a specific action verb.

side_effects.description: List of observed or guaranteed system state changes (e.g., 'FILE_MUTATION', 'MEMORY_UPDATE').

parameter_schema.description: The JSON schema required for the 'parameters' object within the M-01 Intent.

is_query_only.description: Indicates if the action changes system state or is read-only.
